Bash(echo "## Production Build Commands Reference ##

# BUILD COMMANDS:
npm run build:production    # Build + create DMG installer (what we just did)
npm run build:dmg          # Same as above
npm run build:electron     # Build app without installer packaging
npm run electron:build     # Same as above

# RUN COMMANDS:
# Option 1: Use the built app
open ''release/mac-universal/Woodpecker API.app''

# Option 2: Install from DMG then run from Applications
# Double-click the DMG file: ''release/Woodpecker API-1.0.0-universal.dmg''
# Drag to Applications folder, then run from Applications

# Option 3: Run directly from terminal (with console output)
''release/mac-universal/Woodpecker API.app/Contents/MacOS/Woodpecker API''

# CLEAN BUILD (if you need fresh build):
rm -rf release/ dist/ dist-electron/
npm run build:production
")
